landing_faq.how_it_work_text: Our app provides a user‚Äëfriendly platform for teachers and students to connect. It also supports cryptocurrency payments for added privacy and security.
landing_faq.is_anonymous_text: Yes. We do not require banking information. You get the benefits of learning a new language without compromising your privacy.
landing_faq.how_to_pay_text: You can pay with crypto. Simple, fast and secure.
landing_faq.can_i_trust_text: We aim to provide a safe environment. Your data remains private.
landing_faq.how_to_start_text: Create a profile, explore lessons, book a session and start learning.

landing_hero.sub: Our language learning application offers an anonymous and secure environment for teachers and students. With crypto payments, you can enjoy the benefits of a decentralized currency without the need for traditional banking information.

landing_features.crypto_text: Effortless transactions: embrace the future of payment.
landing_features.anon_text: Experience the benefits of anonymous language learning.
landing_features.app_title: Discover the power of our app
landing_features.app_text: Learn at your own pace with our easy-to-use interface.

landing_discover.title: Discover our innovative Language Learning App
landing_discover.text: Our application offers a range of benefits for both teachers and students. Teachers can easily create and manage their language courses, while students can enjoy a seamless learning experience with speaking lessons and personalized feedback.

landing_steps.title: Get started in 3 simple steps
landing_steps.step1_title: Join our language learning community today!
landing_steps.step1_text: Signing up is quick and easy. Begin your journey by creating a profile. The app helps students explore lessons and teachers showcase their expertise.
landing_steps.step2_title: Explore lessons and connect with the right match
landing_steps.step2_text: Discover diverse lessons. For students, find the perfect teacher; for teachers, showcase your lessons to connect with eager learners.
landing_steps.step3_title: Start your journey to learn a new language
landing_steps.step3_text: Finalize your connection by booking lessons (for students) or getting booked (for teachers). Pay with crypto and start the learning journey!

landing_contact.title: Get in touch!
landing_contact.sub: Have a question or need support? Contact us!
landing_contact.agree: I fully agree to the Terms and Conditions stated.

landing_bottom.title: Learn a new language today
landing_bottom.text: Discover the power of EasySpeak and unlock your potential to speak confidently and fluently in a short amount of time. Join our community and start your journey to improved speaking skills today!

first.title: Welcome to EasySpeak!
first.subtitle: Let's get started on your language-learning journey. Are you here to learn or teach?

learnOption.title: I'm here to learn
learnOption.description: Explore lessons, book tutors, and enhance your language skills with personalized learning plans.

teachOption.title: I'm here to teach
teachOption.description: Share your expertise, connect with students, and guide them on their language-learning adventures.

second.title: Learning everywhere
second.mobileDescription: Experience joyful learning with us, no matter where you are!
second.desktopDescription: Experience joyful learning with us, no matter where you are! Discover the freedom to learn on the go. With EasySpeak, dive into a world of knowledge anytime, anywhere. Join us in embracing learning beyond boundaries.

slogan_2: to Improve Quality of Your Life
aim_details: MindHealer aims to remove obstacles for psychotherapists and their clients by building a portal where psychotherapists from different countries can practice, teach, earn and learn from each other.
demand_details_1: The global psychologists market was valued at $381 billion in 2020 (that does not include developing countries). And the numbers are rising, especially after the pandemic and in the context of ongoing military conflicts, global recession and rise of inflation and crime.
demand_details_2: However, many professionals cannot provide their services to international markets because of strictly defined, often outdated rules.
problem_title_1: Competition of Old and Modern Methods
problem_text_1: Psychotherapy is a new science (less than 150 years old). There are many effective approaches and methods, some of them are still created. Practitioners of old methods are trying to restrict newcomers from the market creating government-linked-associations that would issue permissions for practice. As a result, innovative psychotherapists, creators of new methods are left out.
problem_text_2: A psychotherapist from a developing country would not be allowed to practice online in a developed country, his education would not be recognized by the developed-country-government-linked-association of psychotherapists.
problem_text_3: While selecting a psychotherapist a client does not know much about him or her. How many hours of personal therapy does he have? Does he attend supervisions? How profound is his education?
problem_title_4: Absence of Universal Professional Ranking System for Psychotherapists
problem_text_4: It is often not clear why psychotherapist A charges X USD for his session and psychotherapist B charges X*3 USD. Is that because of experience,  marketing or other reason?
problem_title_5: Marketing and Finding Clients for a Psychotherapist
problem_text_5: It is often difficult for psychotherapists to promote themselves and find clients. Unlike in other professions working with friends and relatives is considered bad practice. On the other hand expert marketers even if not expert psychotherapists are able to find more clients.
problem_text_6: There‚Äôre many cases when a psychotherapist whould try to take advantage of his client or his client's resources. Clients often don‚Äôt understand that a psychotherapist is breaking their boundaries or may not know how to deal with it.
solution_text_1: MindHealer aims to create a safe portal that would promote mental health, be a source of knowledge and a sandbox for experienced psychotherapists and beginners.
solution_text_2: By using blockchain technology MindHealer makes psychotherapists‚Äô credentials transparent, yet preserves anonymity of clients and supervisors.
solution_text_3: To reward psychotherapists‚Äô knowledge and skill, and also to erase political and administrative borders MindHealer introduces a psychotherapist ranking system that would be based on the verified amount of hours of personal therapy and other criteria.

psychologist_title: Are You a Psychologist or Psychoterapist?
psychologist_text: MindHealer invites you to create an account and join the project.
psychologist_feature_1: Simple and free way to find requests for therapy from new clients
psychologist_feature_2: Are you a freshman? We got you covered. MindHealer is the best place to start a career in psychotherapy.
psychologist_feature_3: Have video calls with your old and new clients: Your old clients can find you by professional nickname.
psychologist_feature_4: Receive payments for your work instantly.
psychologist_feature_5: Work anonymously: Build your reputation around a nick name. Your government ID personality doesn't have to be part of it.

direct_request_tooltip: Client asks you for help directly. No other specialist can respond to this request.
psy_rank_why: Rank reflects expert's experience and qualifications. A higher level of experience of an expert allows him/her to accept more expensive requests from clients. To start working as an expert at MindHealer, you need to create account, click Work as Expert and fill in the application form. If you already have experience working as a therapist, professional education and a large number of hours in personal therapy, this will all be taken into account when assigning a rank.
rank_text_1: Equals üéí Undergraduate student OR Basic Counseling Certificates, Short Workshops; Online trainings, life coaching, non-regulated courses. To obtain rank-1 you need to have basic knowledge of the theoretical material required for counselling. It is also necessary to have more than 50 hours of personal therapy.
rank_text_2: Equals üéí Undergraduate student OR Basic Counseling Certificates, Short Workshops; Online trainings, life coaching, non-regulated courses. To obtain 2nd rank you need to have 1 rank and more than 100 hours of personal therapy.
rank_text_3: Equals üéì Graduate of bachelor's, or postgraduate diploma student; Certificate/Diploma in Counseling (6 months to 1 year); Entry-level practice in some countries; Is awarded after passing the exam to therapists of rank 2 with more than 150 hours of personal therapy.
rank_text_4: Equals üéì Graduate of bachelor's, or postgraduate diploma student; Is awarded after passing the exam to therapists of rank 3 with more than 200 hours of personal therapy.
rank_text_5: Equals üè´ Master's student (mid-level trainee); Is awarded after passing the exam to therapists of rank 4 with more than 250 hours of personal therapy.
rank_text_6: Equals üè´ Master's student (mid-level trainee); Is awarded after passing the exam to therapists of rank 5 with more than 300 hours of personal therapy.
rank_text_7: Equals üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Licensed professional with growing expertise; Is awarded after passing the exam to therapists of rank 6 with more than 400 hours of personal therapy.
rank_text_8: Equals üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Licensed professional with growing expertise; Is awarded after passing the exam to therapists of rank 7 with more than 600 hours of personal therapy.
rank_text_9: Equals üß† Research-level clinical expert; Is awarded after passing the exam to therapists of rank 8 with more than 1000 hours of personal therapy.
rank_text_10: Equals üåç Internationally recognized authority; Is awarded after passing the exam to therapists of rank 9 with more than 2000 hours of personal therapy.

profile_title_info: Psyname - is your professinal name. Clients can make an appointment with you only by Psyname. If you already have clients, tell them that they can make an appointment with you at MindHealer and send a link to your profile. Your Psyname would be used as a signature when your publish articles at MindHealer Magazine. Psyname doesn't have to coinside with your real name.
name: Name
account_not_created: Account couldn't be created. Please, contact support!
reset_msg: Enter your email, we'll send instuctions how to restore your lost password.
error: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.
no_therapist_found: There is no therapist with that nickname
general_el_01: Client selects day and time of the session.
general_el_03: Client pays the full amount of the session, payment is stored inside a smartcontract.
general_el_04: Therapist will pay a refundable deposit of 10% of the session price in order to accept client's request and confirm his/her participation.
general_el_05: The session is held on the exact day and time chosen by the client.
general_el_06: If client does not join call in time - the session time is not extended, if psychologist does not join call in more than 10 minutes - the non-refundable deposit is credited to the client; more than 25 minutes - therapist is obliged to carry the next session free of charge.
general_el_07: If client misses a session, funds are credited to the therapist in due order.
general_el_08: If therapist misses a session funds are refunded to the client along with the amount of the deposit minus the system fee.
general_el_09: If the session went well - client and therapist arrived on time, upon completion of the session, therapist receives 95% of the session fee and the deposit of 10% is refunded.
psy_resp_el_00: keeping information he/she hears from the client in secret;
psy_resp_el_02: following ethical rules and best psychological practices;
psy_resp_el_03: providing psychological care in an atmosphere of respect;
psy_resp_el_04: reliability of the information provided to the client;
psy_resp_el_05: providing information about amis and focus of psychological work, including methods etc;
psy_resp_el_06: analyzing what is happening during the session;
psy_resp_el_07: keeping track of time during the session;
psy_resp_el_08: high speed internet connection on their side;
booking_flow_step_01_text_01: After Client books a session by selecting an Expert by Params or finds an Expert and pays, his funds are locked inside a smart contract.
booking_flow_step_01_text_02: At this point Client can have a full refund minus transaction fees.
booking_flow_title_02_text_01: Expert‚Äôs deposit is locked inside the same smart contract.
booking_flow_title_02_text_02: At this point Client still can have a refund but there would be a 25% penalty if there are more than 24 hours left before the call.
booking_flow_title_02_text_03: If there‚Äôs less than 24 hours left before the call Client can still have a refund but the penalty increases to 50% of the session price.
booking_flow_title_02_text_04: Expert can also make a refund, until more than 2 hours is left before the call, but in such case 50% of his deposit is sent to Client‚Äôs wallet.
booking_flow_title_03_text_01: After Expert accepts a request, Client gets access to the chat room to exchange information prior to the incoming call if neccesary. When its time for the session Client is able to join via audio or audio/video call.
booking_flow_title_03_text_02: Client is free to use setting to enable or disable his camera & sound.
booking_flow_title_04_text_01: (Coming soon) After the call time ends Client has 15 minutes to submit a complaint transaction if something went wrong.
booking_flow_title_04_text_02: In such case smart contract will be frozen, Admin will join the chat to help you out.
booking_flow_title_04_text_03: (Coming soon) Depending on the situation one of the 3 outcomes is possible:
booking_flow_title_04_option_01_text: Client gets full refund + 50% of the Experts deposit.
booking_flow_title_04_option_02_text: Client get full refund. Expert gets full refund.
booking_flow_title_04_option_03_text: Expert gets back his deposit + price of the session with the exclusion of service fee 5% and promotion fee 15%.
booking_flow_final: If everything went well, in 30 minutes after the call time ends, Expert is able to claim the reward in his account. Expert gets back his deposit + price of the session with exclusion of service fee ‚Äî 5% and promotion fee ‚Äî 15% that is split between partners.
specialist_free_hours_desc: Free time slots for appointments of this specialist.
specialist_recommended_price: Recommended price / 55 min session based on experience:
specialist_price: How much would you charge for a 55 min session
psy_not_resp_el_01: how client will dispose of the information received;
psy_not_resp_el_03: feelings and emotions that client experiences (the psychologist only suggests to realize and analyze them);
psy_not_resp_el_04: client's physical condition (the psychologist only suggets to be aware of and analyze the client's somatic reactions).
psy_rights_el_01: psychologist has a right to keep information about his/her life other personal information private.
psy_rights_el_02: psychologist has a right to request and receive relevant (reliable) information from the client about those aspects of life that are of concern to him/her.
psy_rights_el_03: to improve the quality of care provided, psychologist has the right to record sessions on a recording device (for personal use only).
psy_rights_el_04: psychologist informs the client of the planned vacation two sessions in advance.
psy_rights_el_05: if client has an urgent need for meetings during a break in work, the psychologist would recommend another specialist whose qualifications and specialization would work best to the client's needs.
clients_resp: Client is responsible to himself for:
client_resp_el_01: constructive (or not-constructive) use of session time;
client_resp_el_02: willingness (or unwillingness) to take risks and open up to the psychologist;
client_resp_el_03: the feelings and emotions he or she experiences during and after the session;
client_resp_el_04: willingness (or unwillingness) to experience the discomfort of having to change;
client_resp_el_05: compliance (or non-compliance) with the psychologist's recommendations;
client_resp_el_06: application (or non-application) in life of the knowledge and skills acquired in the counseling process, and thus for achieving (or not achieving) the set goals;
client_resp_el_07: using one's energy, mental and intellectual potential to solve the identified difficulties in the process of psychological work (in sessions and between sessions).
client_resp_to_psy_el_03: dealing no physical damage to him/herself.
client_resp_to_psy_el_04: receiving psychological assistance sober: not to smoke, not to take alcohol during sessions, not to leave the session before it's over, and not to attend sessions under the influence of alcohol, drugs or medications (unless they are prescribed by the doctor);
client_resp_to_psy_el_06: informing psychologist about changes in the following aspects of one's life: work, education, relations with parents, relatives, close friends, husband (wife), sexual partners;
client_resp_to_psy_el_07: informing the psychologist about changes in one's physical and psychological well-being;
client_resp_to_psy_el_08: high speed internet connection on their end;
client_rights_el_01: to interrupt work with psychologist at any stage.
client_rights_el_02: to record sessions on a recording device for personal use, for the purpose of his/her own self-development.
client_rights_el_03: minor clients at the age of 14 have the right to visit a psychologist independently without including parents (legal representatives) in the psychological work.
client_rights_el_04: in the case of child psychotherapy, parents (legal representatives) paying for the work of the psychologist have the right to attend sessions.

subheader: Tell your followers and friends about MindHealer and earn rewards in sigUSD
how_it_work_one: You are getting paid 12% every time when a person who made account at MindHealer via your ReferenceLink or QR code makes a purchase.
how_it_work_two: If you bring a new user to MindHealer and teach him/her how to become a partner, YOU get paid 3% from each purchase made by customers brought by your partner.
how_it_work_two_instr: All you need to do is:
how_it_work_two_instr_one: Tell your followers and friends about the importance of mental health.
how_it_work_two_instr_two: Share the referenceLink or QR code with them.
how_start_one: Create Ergo Nautilus wallet if you do not have one already.
download_nautilus_instr: Here is a video on how to install it. Works only on desktop!
when_connected_click: When your wallet is connected just click the button below.
your_reflink_qr_below: Your RefLink, Ref QR code and other materials will appear below.
use_of_mindhealer_text: The MindHealer app (hereinafter, referred to as the App) allows the use of Nautilus Wallet for accessing the Ergo Blockchain/network. You are not authorized, and nor should you rely on the App for legal advice, business advice, or advice of any kind. You act at your own risk in reliance on the contents of the App. Should you make a decision to act or not act, you should contact a licensed attorney in the relevant jurisdiction in which you want or need help. The owners or contributors of the App are not responsible for your actions, decisions, or other behavior taken or not taken in reliance upon the App.
translations_text: The App may contain translations of the English version of the content available on the App. These translations are provided only as a convenience. In the event of any conflict between the English language version and the translated version, the English version shall take precedence. If you notice any inconsistency, please report it.
risks_title: 3. Risks related to the use of MindHealer
risks_intro: The App, the App‚Äôs partners, employees, contributors, and any affiliates will not be responsible for any losses, damages or claims arising from events falling within the scope of the following five categories:
risk_1: Mistakes made by the user, such as forgotten passwords or payments sent to wrong addresses.
risk_2: Software issues including corrupted wallet files, unsafe cryptographic libraries, or malware.
risk_3: Technical failures, including data loss due to faulty storage devices.
risk_4: Security breaches like unauthorized access to wallets or accounts.
risk_5: Actions or inactions of third parties, including bankruptcy, cyber-attacks, or fraud.
investment_risks_text: Investment in MindHealer or Ergo can result in financial loss over short or long periods. Investors should expect significant price fluctuations.
tax_compliance_text: Users are solely responsible for determining applicable taxes on their Ergo or SigUSD transactions. The App's owners and contributors do not determine taxes.
app_storage_title: 6. The App does not store, send, or receive Ergo or SigUSD
app_storage_text: Ergo and native tokens exist solely within the Ergo network. Transfers occur within the decentralized Ergo network and not within the App.
no_warranties_text: The App is provided 'as is' without any warranties regarding its functionality, content, data, or services.
limitation_of_liability_text: Unless required by law, the App's owners and contributors are not liable for damages, including loss of use, profits, or data arising from use of the App.
arbitration_text: Users agree to arbitrate any disputes arising from or in connection with the App, except for disputes related to copyrights, trademarks, trade secrets, or patents.
expert_policy_intro_01: If you want to offer Expert Services on the MindHealer Platform, you must read and agree to be bound by these policies for Experts.
expert_policy_intro_02: If you do not accept this Expert Policy in full, you are not authorized to work on the MindHealer Platform and you are not eligible to receive any benefits from MindHealer for any Expert Services you provide.
expert_1_1_registration_text_01: In order to become an Expert, you must first submit a complete application through the MindHealer Platform. Your completed Expert Application will be evaluated by MindHealer for approval. If your Expert Application is approved, your Member status will be changed to Expert, you will have the ability to create and manage an Expert profile on the MindHealer Platform, and you can begin providing Expert Services.
expert_1_1_registration_text_02: To the extent permitted by applicable law, MindHealer may obtain background check reports from public records or through third party venders regarding matters such as criminal convictions or sex offender registrations, and/or identity verification check reports. As a condition of applying to become an Expert, you agree and authorize us to use your personal information, such as your full name and date of birth, to obtain such reports. In order to obtain such identity verification check reports, you further agree and authorize us to provide the copy of your passport or official identification card.
expert_1_2_services_description_text: All Experts must create a description of their Expert Services on the MindHealer Platform. When creating the description of your Expert Services, you agree to the following:
expert_services_point_01: Write a specific, detailed service description with clear expert scope.
expert_services_point_02: Set expectations that you can meet or exceed.
expert_services_point_03: Do not offer services with the intent to commit fraud, provide services other than those outlined in your description, or offer any services in exchange for positive feedback or at no cost.
expert_services_point_04: Do not advertise any third-party expert service, platform, software, or application.
expert_services_point_05: Do not include any personal contact information, including but not limited to, email, telephone number, or social media account number.
financial_terms_2_subtitle: Experts must use sigUSD and Ergo to receive and send payment for Expert Services. Experts are responsible for downloading and setting Nautilus Wallet or other Ergo wallets.
financial_terms_2_1_text: MindHealer charges Platform Service Fees upon the Customer confirming the successful completion of a Session. This fee will be deducted when payments are transferred to the Expert's wallet. The fees may vary based on the type of Session or Sessions, the number of Sessions in a package, and the Expert's overall performance. MindHealer reserves the right to modify the Platform Service Fees at any time. Should any changes occur, MindHealer will inform Experts prior to the new fees taking effect.
financial_terms_2_2_title: 2.2 No Circumvention of Platform Service Fees
financial_terms_2_2_text: Experts shall not engage in any action or activity meant to circumvent the Platform Service Fees, with such actions or activities including, but not limited to: (i) suggesting, soliciting, or accepting payment outside of the MindHealer Platform, or by means other than through the Payment Services; or (ii) reporting or listing an inaccurate price for a Session on the MindHealer Platform, or charging a fee for a Session that is different from the amount agreed between Customer and Expert.
financial_terms_2_3_title: 2.3 Withholding or Delaying Disbursement of Funds
financial_terms_2_3_text: If MindHealer determines that an Expert's actions may have resulted or will result in a significant number of disputes, refunds or other claims from Customers who purchased such Expert‚Äôs Sessions, MindHealer reserves the right to delay or stop the account of such Expert. If MindHealer reasonably concludes that an Expert has violated the MindHealer Terms or other MindHealer Policies, MindHealer may refuse to disburse the funds locked in smart contract of such Expert and refund them.
financial_terms_2_4_text: MindHealer may, in its sole discretion, round up or round down amounts that are payable by Customers to Experts to the nearest whole functional base unit in which the currency is denominated (e.g. to the nearest U.S. dollar).
expert_service_request_text: Once you receive an Expert Service request, you agree to the following:
expert_service_3_1_request_p_1: Use the MindHealer Platform to manage all Expert Service requests from Customers;
expert_service_3_1_request_p_2: Respond promptly to all Expert Services related communications, whether from a Customer or from MindHealer;
expert_service_3_1_request_p_3: Maintain a record of all important details of the communication between you and the Customer. For the avoidance of doubt, communication may be conducted via emails, instant messages, telephone or in-person conversations, and important details generally includes information related to the scope of your Expert Services, your time frames and availability to provide any Expert Service, your price, your feedback to Customer, any schedule changes, any delay of providing your Expert Service, and completion of Sessions; and
expert_service_3_1_request_p_4: Respond to all Expert Services requests with accept, decline, or propose a time/date change. Do not ignore Expert Service requests and allow them to expire.
expert_3_2_1_accepting_session_text: Experts will receive requests for Sessions from Customers. By accepting a Session Request, you agree to provide the Session to the Customer at the date and time described in the applicable Session Request. You can choose to decline any Session Request. If you do not respond, the Session Request will automatically expire, and the Session will not be scheduled.
cancelling_session_3_2_2_text_01: If you will be unable to provide your Expert Services at the time previously agreed between you and a Customer, you agree to immediately inform the Customer that you are unable to provide your Expert Services at the scheduled time, and provide the Customer with an explanation. If you were unable to inform the Customer in advance due to an emergency, you are required to give an explanation to the Customer as soon as you are able to do so.
cancelling_session_3_2_2_text_02: After obtaining the consent from the Customer, an Expert may cancel any scheduled Expert Service (including a Session. Canceling or rescheduling an Expert Service must be handled through the MindHealer Platform.
session_packages_3_2_3_text: Experts may offer Customers, and Customers may purchase from Experts, more than one Session in a single package (each such package, a Session Package). Customers are expected to complete all Sessions in a Session Package within six (6) months of the purchase date. You agree to be available to provide Expert Services to Customers who have purchased a Session Package until the Package Expiration Date. In the unlikely event that you cannot provide Expert Services for all Sessions included in a Session Package by the Package Expiration Date, it is your responsibility to contact the Customer immediately. You must provide the Customer with an explanation and work together to reach an agreement on whether to extend or cancel the Session Package.
additional_guidelines_3_2_4_text: By providing Expert Services on the MindHealer Platform, you also agree to:
additional_guidelines_3_2_4_point_01: 1. Maintain the privacy of your own personal information;
additional_guidelines_3_2_4_point_02: 2. Maintain records of all invoices and payments connected with your Expert Services;
additional_guidelines_3_2_4_point_03: 3. Cooperate with MindHealer in any anti-fraud actions and in resolving any disputes;
additional_guidelines_3_2_4_point_04: 4. Maintain records of all important details of communications with the Customers. If there is a dispute between Expert and Customer, MindHealer will request evidence from both the Expert and the Customer in the form of screenshots, and such screenshots must contain all information related to the relevant dispute, including the date, time and other communication details; and
additional_guidelines_3_2_4_point_05: 5. Report any violation of the MindHealer Terms or any other MindHealer Policies, including misuse of ratings and feedback.
expert_code_4_1_text: Respect the values and traditions of your Customers and keep in mind that stereotypical assumptions can be offensive.
expert_code_4_2_be_professional_text: Experts must take the initiative in communicating with and managing Customers. Experts are expected to provide Expert Services in a professional manner, which includes:
expert_code_4_2_be_professional_point_01: 1. Being responsive.You should respond to messages from Customers promptly.
expert_code_4_2_be_professional_point_02: 2. Actively managing your calendar and profile.Maintain your calendar to accurately reflect the times you are available to provide Expert Services. If you plan to take time off from providing Expert Services, update your profile accordingly so that you will be removed from active Expert listings.
expert_code_4_2_be_professional_point_03: 3. Respecting Customer privacy. Respecting Customer privacy includes refraining from requesting any personally identifiable information from Customers, such as birth date, age, government-issued identification number, phone number, or home address;
expert_code_4_3_arrive_on_time: 4.3 Attend All Sessions and Arrive On Time
expert_code_4_3_arrive_on_time_text_01: MindHealer expects that Experts will responsibly attend Sessions at the scheduled times and should initiate contact with the Customer, particularly with a first-time Customer.
expert_code_4_3_arrive_on_time_text_02: Cancelling scheduled Sessions should be your last resort. If a Customer is late for a scheduled Session, the Expert should wait for the Customer until the end of the period for the scheduled Session. The Expert should be available to start the Session at any time during the scheduled period for the Session. The Expert is not, however, required to make up for lost time due to the Customer‚Äôs late arrival.
expert_code_4_4_mindhealer_ambassador_te: By providing Expert Services on the MindHealer Platform, you agree to uphold a positive attitude regarding MindHealer and its employees. Additionally, you agree not to publicly disclose any information or content exchanged between you and MindHealer without MindHealer‚Äôs prior consent.
expert_content_5_text: The terms of this section regarding Expert Content applies to all Experts providing Expert Services on the MindHealer Platform.
expert_content_5_1_ownership_text: Any articles, video or any other materials used in your Expert Services or submitted to the MindHealer Platform in connection with your Expert Services, such as your introduction video (the 'Expert Content'), constitute Member Content. As a result, pursuant to this section of the MindHealer Terms, you own the copyright to your Expert Content, and MindHealer does not claim any ownership rights in any Expert Content.
expert_content_5_2_customer_license_to_e: You hereby grant each Customer who purchases your Expert Services a right to use, view and copy your Expert Content that you use in providing your Expert Services to such Customer solely for personal and noncommercial educational purposes. You acknowledge that all of the representations, warranties, license grants and other provisions apply to all of your Expert Content that you submit to the MindHealer Platform.
expert_content_5_3_license_to_expert_con: In addition to the license you grant to MindHealer to use, view, copy, modify, distribute, publish and otherwise exploit your Expert Content, you hereby grant MindHealer a license to use your Expert Content (including your introduction video) and information about your Expert Services in marketing, advertising and promotion of the MindHealer Platform in any medium. For the avoidance of doubt, MindHealer may publish your introduction video to MindHealer‚Äôs official channels in third-party video hosting and streaming services, such as Youtube, Vimeo, Youku etc. MindHealer will remove any Expert introduction videos from our official channels on third-party video hosting and streaming services upon written request from such Expert sent to MindHealer customer service. You also grant MindHealer the right to use your profile name as part of our marketing, advertising and promotion of the MindHealer Platform.
prohibitions_6_text: In addition to complying with the restrictions regarding improper use of the MindHealer Platform, you agree not to, and will not assist, encourage, or enable Customers or other Experts to:
prohibitions_6_point_01: 1. Provide or post false, misleading, inaccurate, or plagiarized information on the MindHealer Platform, including in your Expert profile, course content, lesson history and feedback.
prohibitions_6_point_02: 2. Fail to establish or maintain your MindHealer Expert profile to ensure that it contains complete, accurate, and updated information.
prohibitions_6_point_03: 3. Provide your Expert Services for free or in exchange for positive feedback or ratings from Customers.
prohibitions_6_point_04: 4. Provide your Expert Service, including offering and providing Sessions, to any 'fake' Customers that uses MindHealer Account created by yourself or any third party to drive up your session counts and ratings in bad faith.
prohibitions_6_point_05: 5. Forge or alter your education background, curriculum vitae, work experience or certificates.
prohibitions_6_point_06: 6. Advertise or promote third party services.
prohibitions_6_point_07: 7. Encourage or allow Customers to work with you outside of the MindHealer Platform or accept payment outside of the MindHealer Platform. If a Customer asks you to provide Expert Services outside of the MindHealer Platform, please remind the Customer that sessions must be scheduled and paid for through the MindHealer Platform. You can report the Customer or contact MindHealer customer support.
prohibitions_6_point_08: 8. Engage in extremely negative and defamatory behavior toward others or MindHealer.
prohibitions_6_final_text: In the event that you violate the prohibitions set forth in this section, MindHealer reserves the right to immediately suspend or deactivate your MindHealer Account. If you believe that others have violated these prohibitions, or if you are not sure whether any specific actions would violate these prohibitions, please contact MindHealer customer support immediately.
violation_7_expert_policy_text: You are expected to perform any Expert Service in a manner that satisfies the standards described above and results in a consistently high level of Customer satisfaction. You are in breach of this Expert Policy, if you:
violation_7_expert_policy_point_01: 1. Fail to deliver any Expert Service for which payment was accepted;
violation_7_expert_policy_point_02: 2. Fail to take reasonable efforts to resolve a dispute with a Customer;
violation_7_expert_policy_point_03: 3. Create unacceptable levels of Customer dissatisfaction; or
violation_7_expert_policy_point_04: 4. Violate any MindHealer Terms or any other MindHealer Policies.
violation_7_response_text: MindHealer reserves the right to take any of the following actions at any time and in its sole discretion:
violation_7_response_point_03: 3. Suspend or terminate your MindHealer Account; or
violation_7_response_point_04: 4. Contact law enforcement or seek legal remedies
customer_service_8_text: If you wish to report a violation of this Expert Policy, MindHealer Terms or any other MindHealer Policies, or have any questions or need assistance, please contact MindHealer customer service
you_have_no_events: You're not taking part in any events yet.
